ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7000 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <5> Battery Charger + <6> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<7> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> Precision Design Flash w/ LED + <9> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7000 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-300mm VR Lens + 64GB Card + Case + LED Flash + Battery + Tripod + Filter Kit
